entities.name: duelling club
entities.description: The duelling club is mentioned in the context of a location where an incident occurred.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who is mentioned as being involved in the incident and making threats to expel someone.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a person who has a cauldron that was affected by the firework.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is suspected of throwing the firework and is being threatened by Snape.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is helping Harry with a potion in Moaning Myrtle’s bathroom.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is reassuring Harry that Snape cannot prove it was him who threw the firework.

entities.name: moaning myrtle's bathroom
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle’s bathroom is mentioned as a location where Hermione and Ron are helping Harry with a potion.

relationships.description: Snape threatens to expel Harry if he finds out who threw the firework.
Hermione is in Moaning Myrtle’s bathroom, helping Harry with a potion.
